trans-unit.source: Contains information about an area of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control or a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
ListViewHitTestInfo is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method is called.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain items or the position indicated is not on an item.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
Gets the location of a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control, in relation to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> and the items it contains.

This property will return <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations> if the hit test indicates a position that is within the client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> but is not located on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
This value will be `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> does not contain subitems or the position indicated is not on a subitem.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> at the position indicated by a hit test on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
